title: Car discounts make comeback after four long years of waiting in the auto industry
description: Car discounts have returned after four years of long waitlists, driven by changes in the automotive industry's pricing strategies. Dealers are ramping up production to meet high demand, especially for SUVs, and are offering substantial discounts across various models. Some discounts reach as high as Rs 1.5 lakh on specific models, including hatchbacks, sedans, and electric vehicles (EVs).
